issue.title: Configure Renovate
issue.body:
Welcome to [Renovate](https://renovatebot.com)! This is an onboarding PR to help you understand and configure settings before regular Pull Requests begin. :vertical_traffic_light: To activate Renovate, merge this Pull Request. To disable Renovate, simply close this Pull Request unmerged. --- ### Detected Package Files * `assets/package.json` (npm) ### Configuration Summary Based on the default config's presets, Renovate will: - Start dependency updates only once this Configure Renovate PR is merged - Separate major versions of dependencies into individual branches/PRs - Do not separate patch and minor upgrades into separate PRs for the same dependency - Upgrade to unstable versions only if the existing version is unstable - Raise PRs immediately (after branch is created) - Use renovate/ as prefix for all branch names - If semantic commits detected, use semantic commit type fix for dependencies and chore for all others - Keep existing branches updated even when not scheduled - Disable automerging feature - wait for humans to merge all PRs - Ignore `node_modules`, `bower_components`, `vendor` and various test/tests directories - Update existing lock files only when package.json is modified - Autodetect whether to pin dependencies or maintain ranges - Rate limit PR creation to a maximum of two per hour - Limit to maximum 20 concurrent Renovate PRs at any time - Group known monorepo packages together - Use curated list of recommended non-monorepo package groupings :abcd: Would you like to change the way Renovate is upgrading your dependencies? Simply edit the `renovate.json` in this branch with your custom config and the list of Pull Requests in the "What to Expect" section below will be updated the next time Renovate runs. --- ### What to Expect With your current configuration, Renovate will create 20 Pull Requests:
Pin dependencies - Branch name: `renovate/pin-dependencies` - Pin [axios](https://renovatebot.com/gh/axios/axios) to `0.18.0` - Pin [babel-core](https://renovatebot.com/gh/babel/babel) to `6.26.0` - Pin [babel-loader](https://renovatebot.com/gh/babel/babel-loader) to `7.1.4` - Pin [babel-plugin-transform-class-properties](https://renovatebot.com/gh/babel/babel) to `6.24.1` - Pin [babel-plugin-transform-object-rest-spread](https://renovatebot.com/gh/babel/babel) to `6.26.0` - Pin [babel-plugin-transform-react-jsx](https://renovatebot.com/gh/babel/babel) to `6.24.1` - Pin [babel-preset-env](https://renovatebot.com/gh/babel/babel-preset-env) to `1.6.1` - Pin [copy-webpack-plugin](https://renovatebot.com/gh/webpack-contrib/copy-webpack-plugin) to `4.5.1` - Pin [css-loader](https://renovatebot.com/gh/webpack-contrib/css-loader) to `0.28.11` - Pin [extract-text-webpack-plugin](https://renovatebot.com/gh/webpack-contrib/extract-text-webpack-plugin) to `4.0.0-beta.0` - Pin [fetch-jsonp](https://renovatebot.com/gh/camsong/fetch-jsonp) to `1.1.3` - Pin [file-loader](https://renovatebot.com/gh/webpack-contrib/file-loader) to `1.1.11` - Pin [material-ui](https://renovatebot.com/gh/callemall/material-ui) to `1.0.0-beta.38` - Pin [react](https://renovatebot.com/gh/facebook/react) to `16.2.0` - Pin [react-device-detect](https://renovatebot.com/gh/duskload/react-device-detect) to `0.1.0` - Pin [react-dom](https://renovatebot.com/gh/facebook/react) to `16.2.0` - Pin [react-google-maps](https://renovatebot.com/gh/tomchentw/react-google-maps) to `9.4.5` - Pin [react-redux](https://renovatebot.com/gh/reduxjs/react-redux) to `5.0.7` - Pin [react-router](https://renovatebot.com/gh/ReactTraining/react-router) to `4.2.0` - Pin [react-router-dom](https://renovatebot.com/gh/ReactTraining/react-router) to `4.2.2` - Pin [react-slick](https://renovatebot.com/gh/akiran/react-slick) to `0.22.2` - Pin [redux](https://renovatebot.com/gh/reduxjs/redux) to `3.7.2` - Pin [redux-thunk](https://renovatebot.com/gh/reduxjs/redux-thunk) to `2.2.0` - Pin [slick-carousel](https://renovatebot.com/gh/kenwheeler/slick) to `1.8.1` - Pin [style-loader](https://renovatebot.com/gh/webpack-contrib/style-loader) to `0.20.3` - Pin [webpack-cli](https://renovatebot.com/gh/webpack/webpack-cli) to `2.0.13`
Update dependency babel-core to v6.26.3 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/babel6-monorepo` - Upgrade [babel-core](https://renovatebot.com/gh/babel/babel) to `6.26.3`
Update dependency babel-loader to v7.1.5 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/babel-loader-7.x` - Upgrade [babel-loader](https://renovatebot.com/gh/babel/babel-loader) to `7.1.5`
Update dependency babel-preset-env to v1.7.0 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/babel-preset-env-1.x` - Upgrade [babel-preset-env](https://renovatebot.com/gh/babel/babel-preset-env) to `1.7.0`
Update dependency copy-webpack-plugin to v4.6.0 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/copy-webpack-plugin-4.x` - Upgrade [copy-webpack-plugin](https://renovatebot.com/gh/webpack-contrib/copy-webpack-plugin) to `4.6.0`
Update dependency material-ui to v1.0.0-beta.46 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/material-ui-1.x` - Upgrade [material-ui](https://renovatebot.com/gh/callemall/material-ui) to `1.0.0-beta.46`
Update dependency react-redux to v5.1.1 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/react-redux-5.x` - Upgrade [react-redux](https://renovatebot.com/gh/reduxjs/react-redux) to `5.1.1`
Update dependency react-slick to v0.23.2 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/react-slick-0.x` - Upgrade [react-slick](https://renovatebot.com/gh/akiran/react-slick) to `0.23.2`
Update dependency redux-thunk to v2.3.0 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/redux-thunk-2.x` - Upgrade [redux-thunk](https://renovatebot.com/gh/reduxjs/redux-thunk) to `2.3.0`
Update dependency style-loader to v0.23.1 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/style-loader-0.x` - Upgrade [style-loader](https://renovatebot.com/gh/webpack-contrib/style-loader) to `0.23.1`
Update dependency webpack to v4.25.1 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/webpack-4.x` - Upgrade [webpack](https://renovatebot.com/gh/webpack/webpack) to `4.25.1`
Update dependency webpack-cli to v2.1.5 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/webpack-cli-2.x` - Upgrade [webpack-cli](https://renovatebot.com/gh/webpack/webpack-cli) to `2.1.5`
Update react monorepo to v16.6.3 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/react-monorepo` - Upgrade [react](https://renovatebot.com/gh/facebook/react) to `16.6.3` - Upgrade [react-dom](https://renovatebot.com/gh/facebook/react) to `16.6.3`
Update reactrouter monorepo to v4.3.1 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/reactrouter-monorepo` - Upgrade [react-router](https://renovatebot.com/gh/ReactTraining/react-router) to `4.3.1` - Upgrade [react-router-dom](https://renovatebot.com/gh/ReactTraining/react-router) to `4.3.1`
Update dependency babel-loader to v8 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/babel-loader-8.x` - Upgrade [babel-loader](https://renovatebot.com/gh/babel/babel-loader) to `8.0.4`
Update dependency css-loader to v1 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/css-loader-1.x` - Upgrade [css-loader](https://renovatebot.com/gh/webpack-contrib/css-loader) to `1.0.1`
Update dependency file-loader to v2 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/file-loader-2.x` - Upgrade [file-loader](https://renovatebot.com/gh/webpack-contrib/file-loader) to `2.0.0`
Update dependency react-device-detect to v1 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/react-device-detect-1.x` - Upgrade [react-device-detect](https://renovatebot.com/gh/duskload/react-device-detect) to `1.6.1`
Update dependency redux to v4 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/redux-4.x` - Upgrade [redux](https://renovatebot.com/gh/reduxjs/redux) to `4.0.1`
Update dependency webpack-cli to v3 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/webpack-cli-3.x` - Upgrade [webpack-cli](https://renovatebot.com/gh/webpack/webpack-cli) to `3.1.2`

:children_crossing: Branch creation will be limited to maximum 2 per hour, so it doesn't swamp any CI resources or spam the project. See: [prHourlyLimit](https://renovatebot.com/docs/configuration-options/#prhourlylimit). --- :question: If you have any questions, try reading the [Docs](https://renovatebot.com/docs), particularly the Getting Started section. Also, you can post questions about your config in [Renovate's Config Help repository](https://renovatebot.com/gh/renovatebot/config-help/issues). --- This PR has been generated by [Renovate Bot](https://renovatebot.com/gh/marketplace/renovate). View repository job log [here](https://renovatebot.com/dashboard#happysalada/anykura).

issue.title: Configure Renovate
issue.body:
Welcome to [Renovate](https://renovatebot.com)! This is an onboarding PR to help you understand and configure settings before regular Pull Requests begin. :vertical_traffic_light: To activate Renovate, merge this Pull Request. To disable Renovate, simply close this Pull Request unmerged. --- ### Detected Package Files * `assets/package.json` (npm) ### Configuration Summary Based on the default config's presets, Renovate will: - Start dependency updates only once this Configure Renovate PR is merged - Separate major versions of dependencies into individual branches/PRs - Do not separate patch and minor upgrades into separate PRs for the same dependency - Upgrade to unstable versions only if the existing version is unstable - Raise PRs immediately (after branch is created) - Use renovate/ as prefix for all branch names - If semantic commits detected, use semantic commit type fix for dependencies and chore for all others - Keep existing branches updated even when not scheduled - Disable automerging feature - wait for humans to merge all PRs - Ignore `node_modules`, `bower_components`, `vendor` and various test/tests directories - Update existing lock files only when package.json is modified - Autodetect whether to pin dependencies or maintain ranges - Rate limit PR creation to a maximum of two per hour - Limit to maximum 20 concurrent Renovate PRs at any time - Group known monorepo packages together - Use curated list of recommended non-monorepo package groupings :abcd: Would you like to change the way Renovate is upgrading your dependencies? Simply edit the `renovate.json` in this branch with your custom config and the list of Pull Requests in the "What to Expect" section below will be updated the next time Renovate runs. --- ### What to Expect With your current configuration, Renovate will create 20 Pull Requests:
Pin dependencies - Branch name: `renovate/pin-dependencies` - Pin [axios](https://renovatebot.com/gh/axios/axios) to `0.18.0` - Pin [babel-core](https://renovatebot.com/gh/babel/babel) to `6.26.0` - Pin [babel-loader](https://renovatebot.com/gh/babel/babel-loader) to `7.1.4` - Pin [babel-plugin-transform-class-properties](https://renovatebot.com/gh/babel/babel) to `6.24.1` - Pin [babel-plugin-transform-object-rest-spread](https://renovatebot.com/gh/babel/babel) to `6.26.0` - Pin [babel-plugin-transform-react-jsx](https://renovatebot.com/gh/babel/babel) to `6.24.1` - Pin [babel-preset-env](https://renovatebot.com/gh/babel/babel-preset-env) to `1.6.1` - Pin [copy-webpack-plugin](https://renovatebot.com/gh/webpack-contrib/copy-webpack-plugin) to `4.5.1` - Pin [css-loader](https://renovatebot.com/gh/webpack-contrib/css-loader) to `0.28.11` - Pin [extract-text-webpack-plugin](https://renovatebot.com/gh/webpack-contrib/extract-text-webpack-plugin) to `4.0.0-beta.0` - Pin [fetch-jsonp](https://renovatebot.com/gh/camsong/fetch-jsonp) to `1.1.3` - Pin [file-loader](https://renovatebot.com/gh/webpack-contrib/file-loader) to `1.1.11` - Pin [material-ui](https://renovatebot.com/gh/callemall/material-ui) to `1.0.0-beta.38` - Pin [react](https://renovatebot.com/gh/facebook/react) to `16.2.0` - Pin [react-device-detect](https://renovatebot.com/gh/duskload/react-device-detect) to `0.1.0` - Pin [react-dom](https://renovatebot.com/gh/facebook/react) to `16.2.0` - Pin [react-google-maps](https://renovatebot.com/gh/tomchentw/react-google-maps) to `9.4.5` - Pin [react-redux](https://renovatebot.com/gh/reduxjs/react-redux) to `5.0.7` - Pin [react-router](https://renovatebot.com/gh/ReactTraining/react-router) to `4.2.0` - Pin [react-router-dom](https://renovatebot.com/gh/ReactTraining/react-router) to `4.2.2` - Pin [react-slick](https://renovatebot.com/gh/akiran/react-slick) to `0.22.2` - Pin [redux](https://renovatebot.com/gh/reduxjs/redux) to `3.7.2` - Pin [redux-thunk](https://renovatebot.com/gh/reduxjs/redux-thunk) to `2.2.0` - Pin [slick-carousel](https://renovatebot.com/gh/kenwheeler/slick) to `1.8.1` - Pin [style-loader](https://renovatebot.com/gh/webpack-contrib/style-loader) to `0.20.3` - Pin [webpack-cli](https://renovatebot.com/gh/webpack/webpack-cli) to `2.0.13`
Update dependency babel-core to v6.26.3 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/babel6-monorepo` - Upgrade [babel-core](https://renovatebot.com/gh/babel/babel) to `6.26.3`
Update dependency babel-loader to v7.1.5 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/babel-loader-7.x` - Upgrade [babel-loader](https://renovatebot.com/gh/babel/babel-loader) to `7.1.5`

Update react monorepo to v16.6.3 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/react-monorepo` - Upgrade [react](https://renovatebot.com/gh/facebook/react) to `16.6.3` - Upgrade [react-dom](https://renovatebot.com/gh/facebook/react) to `16.6.3`
Update reactrouter monorepo to v4.3.1 - Schedule: "at any time" - Branch name: `renovate/reactrouter-monorepo` - Upgrade [react-router](https://renovatebot.com/gh/ReactTraining/react-router) to `4.3.1` - Upgrade [react-router-dom](https://renovatebot.com/gh/ReactTraining/react-router) to `4.3.1`
